style.base: px-6 py-2.5 rounded-xl bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-purple-700 text-white font-semibold transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105 hover:shadow-xl hover:from-blue-700 hover:to-purple-800 shadow-lg
style.mobile: mt-4 w-full px-6 py-3 rounded-xl bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-purple-700 text-white font-semibold shadow-lg active:scale-95 transition-transform

styles.navbar: fixed top-0 left-0 right-0 z-50 bg-gradient-to-b from-blue-50/95 via-blue-50/60 to-transparent backdrop-blur-md shadow-none
styles.logoGradient: text-3xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-400 to-purple-600 bg-clip-text text-transparent

navLink.base: px-3 py-2 text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-700 font-semibold text-base transition-all duration-300 relative group
navLink.mobile: block px-6 py-3 rounded-xl text-base font-semibold text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-50 transition-all duration-300

styles.mobileMenu: px-2 pt-2 pb-3 space-y-1 sm:px-3 bg-gradient-to-b from-blue-50/95 to-blue-50/80 backdrop-blur-md
styles.mobileButton: inline-flex items-center justify-center p-2 rounded-md text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-900 hover:bg-blue-100/50 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-inset focus:ring-blue-200
